item.title: Dog mess, 27th November

item.title: Sippery ,dangerous leaves outside my front door and front garden, 27th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerville Road, Penge, Greater London

item.title: This healthy tree is going to be cut down, 27th November
item.description:
The tree is healthy and full of nesting birds the directors of the block have asked the council to cut it down because of a parking space underneath. The birds occasionally poo on the cars. It’s a beautiful healthy mature tree. Can we stop this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bycullah Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, broken Pallets. beer cans, 27th November
item.description:
Litter is accumulating in the Car Park in Old Dover Road, just outside our back door entrance. The car park has not been cleaned for a long time - at least several months. The car park is on the right hansd side as you approach the bridge over the motorway on Old Dover Road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Old Dover Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Where in attached to street only ex traffic lights bike, 27th November
item.description:

item.title: Stopped at the invalid section, 27th November
item.description:
Every day for school run this women stops at the invalid section, many times old people with blue badges asking her to move the car but she never move it, it is every single day she is stopping on that place

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Churchgate, Broxbourne
